titleStmt.title: The Judgment or resolution of all the lords, the judges, and other the lords assembled in Star-Chamber, anno regni Regis Jacobi Secundo mentioned in the lord chancellors speech to the lord mayor and aldermen of London, attending His Majesty in council the 10th of December, in the 31th year of His said Majesties reign, annoque Domini, 1679, touching procuring hands to petitions relating to state affairs.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
